articles.title: I-O blockbusters from Merck, BMS and more linked to poor COVID-19 outcomes: study - FiercePharma
articles.description: Cancer patients at Memorial Sloan Kettering who developed COVID-19 faced a higher risk of poor outcomes if they had been treated with checkpoint inhibitors such as Merck's Keytruda, according to a new study.

articles.title: One person has died and 465 people have gotten sick after interacting with pet poultry - CNN

articles.title: Traces of coronavirus found in sewage in Gujarat - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Traces of Sars-CoV-2, the virus that causes the coronavirus disease (Covid-19), have been found in sewage samples in Gujarat, prompting a central agency to consider strengthening surveillance and study whether contaminated sewage can cause infection.
